title-part.text: HOISTING, LIFTING, HAULING OR PUSHING, NOT OTHERWISE PROVIDED FOR, e.g. DEVICES WHICH APPLY A LIFTING OR PUSHING FORCE DIRECTLY TO THE SURFACE OF A LOAD

reference.text: mounting artificial islands on piles or like supports E02B17/00 : scaffolding combined with lifting devices E04G1/22 ; lifting devices for sliding forms E04G11/24 ; lifting of buildings E04G23/06 ; shores or struts E04G25/00 ; lifts or other hoisting devices on ladders E06C7/12 ; props for mining E21D15/00

note.note-paragraph:
The following IPC groups are not used in the CPC scheme. Subject matter covered by these groups is classified in the following CPC groups:
B66F19/02 covered by B66F19/00

title-part.text: Devices, e.g. jacks, for lifting loads in predetermined steps
with locking elements, e.g. washers, co-operating with posts

CPC-specific-text.text: the devices being operated by fluid pressure

reference.text: B66F1/08 takes precedence

title-part.text: and the devices being actuated mechanically
and the devices being operated by fluid pressure
Devices, e.g. jacks, adapted for uninterrupted lifting of loads

reference.text: mobile jacks of the garage type B66F5/00

title-part.text: with racks comprising pivotable toothed sections or segments, e.g. arranged in pairs

reference.text: B66F3/44 takes precedence; gearings F16H
lazy-tongs mechanisms B66F3/22

title-part.text: actuated through multiple or change-speed gearings

reference.text: B66F11/042 takes precedence
water-pressure machines F03B ; hydraulic gearings F16H ; cylinders, pistons F16J ; fluid-pressure servomotors F15B
lazy-tongs mechanisms B66F3/22
B66F3/35 takes precedence

title-part.text: with means for avoiding excessive shocks on completion of movements

connection of valves to inflatable elastic bodies B60C29/00

Mobile jacks of the garage type mounted on wheels or rollers
Lifting frames, e.g. for lifting vehicles

with wheels for moving around the floor
Mechanical arrangements not covered by the following subgroups

by one or more hydraulic or pneumatic jacks
by several jacks with means for maintaining the platforms horizontal during movement

for selective lifting of parts of vehicles

movable, with their loads, on wheels or the like, e.g. fork-lift trucks

Movements of forks relative to each other - symmetric
Movements of forks relative to each other - independent
Rotation of fork around vertical axis

Whole unit including fork support rotates
